text: Mr. Jones Has a Card Party is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithBernard A. Drew. Motion Picture Series and Sequels: A Reference Guide and stars John R. Cumpson, Florence Lawrence, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * John R. Cumpson as Mr. Jones * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Jones * Linda Arvidson as The Maid * Flora Finch as Guest * Robert Harron as A Messenger * Anita Hendrie as Guest * Charles Inslee as Guest * Arthur V. Johnson as Guest * Jeanie MacPherson as Guest * Mack Sennett as Guest * Harry Solter as Guest ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Mr. Jones Has a Card Party
